article.title: Raytheon to Upgrade Patriot Radars
article.text: Raytheon Integrated Defense Systems, Andover, Massachusetts, was awarded a $92,918,000 firm-fixed-price contract to upgrade of four Patriot radars to configuration 3+ (C3+). One bid was solicited with one received. Work will be performed in Andover, Massachusetts, with an estimated completion date of November 30, 2018. Fiscal 2016 other procurement funds in the amount of $92,918,000 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey, is the contracting activity (W15QKN-16-C-0020).
